text: Rory McIlroy, (born 4 May 1989) is a Northern Irish professional golfer. He won the U.S. Open in 2011, The Open Championship in 2014 and the PGA Championship in 2012 and 2014. He was World Number 1 golfer for a total of 95 weeks between 2012 and 2015. McIlroy was born in Holywood, County Down. He was engaged to Danish tennis player Caroline Wozniacki until their relationship ended in 2014. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:British golfers Category:Members of the Order of the British Empire Category:Northern Irish sportspeople
title: Rory McIlroy
